DetectorStates

public DetectorStates(Recipient r,
                      boolean showDetectors,
                      DetectionModel showModel)
Parameters:
r -
showDetectors - - if true, overlay the detectors on the animation frame
showModel - - if non-null, limit the display to only show detectors of the specified type of DetectionModel.
